title: Ticket #4275: Disable fsync for user logs
description: We currently fsync for the transaction log (on a fast disk), the DAG log (on a slow disk) and the user log (on a slow disk). AFAICT, it's not possible to disable fsync only for the user log; I'd like to be able to do this (and we'd make a corresponding move for the DAG log to a fast disk).
creator: bbockelm
